text: Maya Ray Thurman Hawke (born July 8, 1998) is an American actress, singer- songwriter and model. She is the daughter of actress Uma Thurman and actor Ethan Hawke. She played Jo March in the 2017 BBC version of Little Women. She played Robin Buckley in the third season of the Netflix series Stranger Things (2019). ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Models from New York City Category:People with dyslexia
title: Maya Hawke
